comment.author: 37603091@N02
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Lost American Architecture, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 52454267@N00
comment._content: The Studebaker/Fine Arts building is the taller one on the left, in the background.  The main building in this photo was the original Art Institute of Chicago, long since replaced by the Chicago Club.
